title: Musou Orochi Battle Royal
original_name: 無双 Orochi バトルロイヤル
sinopse: The evil Serpent Demon King Orochi has taken warriors from the Three Kingdoms Period in China and The Warring States Period in Japan and forced them to fight against each other and Orochi himself! Based on the game Musou Orochi, this manga has many funny twists.
